title: View Option
radioLegend: What would you like to view?
radio1Hint: For example, list of hearings due to be heard, either today or in the future
radio2Hint: Find out the live status of hearings currently happening - Crown Court cases only
radio3Hint: A nationwide list of cases, that are ready to be decided by a magistrate, without a hearing. Examples of the cases listed here relate to prosecutions brought by the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency (DVLA) or TV Licensing
